title: Blisszi
author: Blisszi
created_time: February 16, 2023, 04:25:08 AMLast edit: February 16, 2023, 04:46:50 AM by Blisszi
content: Good day ladies and gentleman, welcome to the first of Bitcoin; digital currency business. My name is....we are currently in the digital world which 75% of activities are internet base jobs, e-marketing, networking and trading and today we will be talking about Bitcoin and how it's works. Bitcoin is one the fastest growing digital trading platform that offers you a lot of benefits, trading experience, change of levels and income. We have a lot of testimonies across the shore of the universals who are doing great with Bitcoin, not as temporary job but permanent at the comforts of your home with working internet. believe me you can make a lot of money from Bitcoin. How to open an account:Simply check on the internet using chrome best Bitcoin trading Apps and bitcoin wallet Apps but I would love to refers to binances because is easy and secure to use.Procedures:Create an accountVerify your account with all required document,Deposit Spare money willing risks for the business,But manage your trading risks effectively, you can invest, mining and trading, though I urge to learn first and be satisfy with yourself. Welcome you all onboard, wish you a wonderful bitcoin journey with success. Thank you and God bless you.Bitcoiners this program is coming soon 18th-19th of March 2023 Host by my humble self and my team.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: So.. Bitcoin is a business and it's the fastest growing digital trading platform? Dude what are you smoking. Maybe learn first before trying to promote it.* If you like reading articles: https://coindesk.com/learn* If you like reading books: https://theinternetofmoney.info/* If you like watching videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPQwGV1aLnTuN6kdNWlElfr2tzigB9Nnj

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: Quote from: Blisszi on February 16, 2023, 04:25:08 AMBitcoin is one the fastest growing digital trading platform that offers you a lot of benefits, trading experience, change of levels and income.If I were you, learning the bitcoin fundamentals first before advertising whatever niche you have in mind is the most practical thing to do.- How does Bitcoin work?Quote from: Blisszi on February 16, 2023, 04:25:08 AMbelieve me you can make a lot of money from Bitcoin. I don't think that's a good bitcoin advertising because in the first place, bitcoin also made people homeless. Making a bold assumption like bitcoin is a get rich quick scheme won't get you far...

comments.author: tbct_mt2
comments.body: I don't understand why you made this topic.I thought it is an invitation letter to guests, customers. Is it a letter from your business or from Binance?I don't think it is from Binance definitely so only one chance left, it is from your business. So where is the link of the invitation letter on your website?Because it is impossible from your business, I move my mind to another option, it is your educational topic to guide newbies creating accounts on centralized exchanges for trading. In this guide, you teach them to open account on Binance.Binance. How to get started? New user guideIt's worthy to mention Reminder: do not keep your money in online accounts

comments.author: Blisszi
comments.body: Quote from: mk4 on February 16, 2023, 05:14:11 AMSo.. Bitcoin is a business and it's the fastest growing digital trading platform? Dude what are you smoking. Maybe learn first before trying to promote it.* If you like reading articles: https://coindesk.com/learn* If you like reading books: https://theinternetofmoney.info/* If you like watching videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPQwGV1aLnTuN6kdNWlElfr2tzigB9NnjLol, I don't smoke, am only learning and ready to learn more that's why I suggest critique because I want to host a program in my local community but since I will include social media handle that's why I want to hear from mentors like you. Thank you for the site you introduced and advised to keep learning first before doing anything.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Ok, all messy. You didn't pass.Wouldn't you rather summarize what you've learned so far so that everyone corrects your misunderstanding? Don't be too confident teaching people while you just learned last night. Keep in mind you're dealing with people's real money around you.Quote from: Blisszi on February 16, 2023, 04:25:08 AMcoming soon 18th-19th of March 2023 Host by my humble self and my team.That fast? postpone this event until next year.

There's still a lot of things he need to study before proceeding on hosting that event. He can't gather and understand at the same time the information he needs to teach to the people in his local community. Bitcoin is a broad topic, especially trading itself. You can't earn money that easy in trading because it is a long term process.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Blisszi on February 16, 2023, 04:25:08 AMBitcoiners this program is coming soon 18th-19th of March 2023 Host by my humble self and my team.If this is your way of promoting your program then it will work in reverse, I don't want to disappoint you but I didn't understand what you are trying to say so hosting something related to Bitcoin will not add much information to us.I hope you rephrase your thoughts and then share them again.

comments.author: doomloop
comments.body: Quote from: tbct_mt2 on February 16, 2023, 07:49:55 AMI don't understand why you made this topic.I thought it is an invitation letter to guests, customers. Is it a letter from your business or from Binance?I don't think it is from Binance definitely so only one chance left, it is from your business. So where is the link of the invitation letter on your website?Because it is impossible from your business, I move my mind to another option, it is your educational topic to guide newbies creating accounts on centralized exchanges for trading. In this guide, you teach them to open account on Binance.Binance. How to get started? New user guideIt's worthy to mention Reminder: do not keep your money in online accountsJust like the title says, the OP is giving tips on how to advertise Bitcoin and I think he only use Binance there as a sample on how can people get involved in Bitcoin but I think that was fast if he will recommend trading without introducing what is Bitcoin first. There is an introduction there but it was wrongly written. As @mk4 said, Bitcoin is not a trading platform but one example of a trading platform is Binance.Bitcoin is only a digital currency or also called as cryptocurrency which is decentralized. He didn't put a link yet to invite anyone about their program because it will not start now but we still have to wait for 1 more month. I guess the OP can still learn more about Bitcoin and hopefully he will improve before the event starts.
